result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael D Buckholt was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Cocaine/Coca, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

9:56 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  FTP $886.00.  Statement by defendant - can pay $75 per month.  Court orders warrant, stayed pending a payment of $75.00 per month commencing the end of October and every month thereafter.  Court quashes the warrant.

Court adjourned at 9:58 a.m.
No Appearance for FTP Hearing Letter sent to Defendant has been returned.  Return to Sender.  Attempted - Not Known.  Unable to Forward.
Summons for FTP sent to Defendant has been returned.  Return to Sender.  Attempted - Not Known.  Unable to Forward.

from Clerk to Defendant
No Appearance by Defendant.  Court orders Warrant.
FTP Hearing 09-28-2015 for $886.00
Final Reminder Notice sent to Defendant has been returned.  Return to Sender.  Attempted, Not Known.  Unable to Forward.

9:16 a.m.  Defendant present in court with Atty Jeffrey Haase.  Lisa Vanden Branden for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by Atty Haase - an agreement has been reached, defendant will plea to count 1 amended to misdemeanor possession of controlled substance/cocaine and defendant will plea to count 2.  Defendant concurs.  ADA concurs.

Court goes over plea questionnaire with the defendant.  Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.  

Defendant enters a plea of NO CONTEST.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty to amended count 1 and count 2.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  Sentencing statement by DA.  Sentencing statement by Atty Haase.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

COUNT 1

90 days county jail - 60 days to report.
Court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

COUNT 2

30 days county jail consecutive to any other sentence.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to report.
Court costs - Court grants the defendant 60 days to ppay or payment plan.

Court grants HUBER.

Court adjourned at 9:25
Plea/sentencing hearing on February 10, 2015 at 09:00 am.
State's

10:10 a.m.  State by ADA Lisa Vanden Branden.  Defendant presen with Attorney Jeffrey Haase.

Statement by Attorney Haase - defendant will be waiving his right to a preliminary hearing - defendant concurs.  Court instructs defendant of his right to a preliminary hearing - defendant waives this right - court accepts the waiver and binds the defendant over for trial.

ADA files an Information with the court and provides a copy to Attorney Haase.  Attorney Haase confirms receipt of the Information - waives reading - stands mute to the charges.  Court makes statement regarding the maximum penalties.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.

Court directs a Status Hearing be scheduled.

Court adjourned at 10:12 a.m.

Status hearing on December 2, 2014 at 10:00 am.

1:08 p.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by the Court, Atty Jeff Haase has been appointed to represent the defendant.  Court will set for status hearing.

Court adjourned at 1:09  p.m.
Status hearing on October 28, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.
Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.

9:56 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs defendant regarding his right to counsel.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at $500.00 signature bond and conditions of:  Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department.  Court instructs defendant regarding his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant waives the time limits.  Court will set for Status Hearing regarding counsel in approx 2 weeks.

Court adjourned at 9:59 a.m.
